name: Thermodynamics & Statistical Mechanics
description: Understanding the mathematical principles of heat, energy transfer, and entropy.

cards.title: Laws of Thermodynamics & Energy Conservation
cards.description: Exploring the fundamental laws governing heat and energy transfer.
bulletpoints: Understand the First Law of Thermodynamics and conservation of energy.
Apply the Second Law of Thermodynamics to entropy and heat engines.
Explore the implications of the Third Law of Thermodynamics in extreme temperatures.

cards.title: Heat Transfer & Thermal Conduction
cards.description: Understanding how heat moves through conduction, convection, and radiation.
bulletpoints: Use Fourier’s Law to analyze heat conduction in materials.
Understand Newton’s Law of Cooling and convective heat transfer.
Apply Stefan-Boltzmann Law to radiative heat exchange.

cards.title: Statistical Mechanics & Entropy Calculations
cards.description: Using probability and statistics to understand microscopic states of matter.
bulletpoints: Study Boltzmann’s entropy formula and statistical interpretation of thermodynamics.
Analyze partition functions and probability distributions in statistical mechanics.
Explore applications of statistical physics in quantum mechanics and black holes.
